issues_found.issue: The clause is missing a signature block for all shareholders.
issues_found.suggestion: Include a signature block for all shareholders to sign.

issues_found.issue: The resolution does not specify the required majority for passing the resolution.
issues_found.suggestion: Specify the required majority for passing the resolution.

issues_found.issue: The clause does not specify the scope of authority granted to the authorised person.
issues_found.suggestion: Clearly define the scope of authority granted to the authorised person.

recommendations: Ensure shareholder names are correctly inserted and signed
